title: fennic
author: fennic
content: I have seen that Bitcoin is always goes in bull and also bear market seasons and in these cycles only big whales are earning and they wil be always be millionaires.But in Stock market that has lasted almost decades to centuries and I do not know if they have also been going like Cryptocurrency market. I think that united States dollars was in bearish for many years when Us Has war with Afghanistan. And now I think it is in bull run season for many years though United States economy is not too strong. So there are many Big members that might have knowledge can address Me.

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: The US was in a bull market for a long time, it's getting closer to being a bear market as it's strained under bearish conditions at the moment due to unrest in a lot of places (such as Russia's border moving closer to Nato - in both ways).It's often said in crypto that it's easy to make money in a bull market and as easy to lose it in a bear (which is likely true). The difference with stock markets is that they're international and there's always a bull market out there (even if not with shares than with forex which has most pairs in both directions).The main trading blocks the US fed focuses on seem to be US, EU, UK and Asia, one of those is often bullish while the others are bearish unless an international event happens like the last 2008 financial crisis - in which case a lot of areas of commodities like gold, land and food start to enter bull markets instead as money that's able to be withdrawn needs to go somewhere providing the rate is good.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: We can't compare other stocks with Bitcoin. Because others stocks aren't volatile like Bitcoin. There is a reason why whales become a millionaire during the Bitcoin bull. Most of us become panic and sell our holdings during a bear market. And whales accumulate when we start the sale. And they don't become panic, as a result, they take huge advantage of the volatility. That's how whales become richer and billionaire.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Quote from: Fesatmas on October 04, 2022, 04:48:42 PMQuote from: The Cryptovator on October 04, 2022, 04:34:06 PMWe can't compare other stocks with Bitcoin. Because others stocks aren't volatile like Bitcoin. There is a reason why whales become a millionaire during the Bitcoin bull. Most of us become panic and sell our holdings during a bear market. And whales accumulate when we start the sale. And they don't become panic, as a result, they take huge advantage of the volatility. That's how whales become richer and billionaire. That's why small investors should not lose the moment. Whales work very smart and always take advantage of market conditions. Meanwhile, what I see from the movement of small investors they only follow the bull market and do not try to take advantage of the bear market. In fact, one of the things that makes us profitable is buying when a bear market occurs. But it is not purely out of ignorance, sometimes most small investors are too overwhelmed by excessive fear and limited capital so that their movement is not very free.They are smart and that's why they become whales. To be honest, I can't see many threads lately "is it the right time to buy Bitcoin" but when Bitcoin starts the green market then many threads will open like this. Because due to fear of loss small investors worried about their capital and this is a big mistake not taking risks.

comments.author: bitzizzix
comments.body: obviously the two are very different.If the stock market loses 50% people will sell their homes to recover the losses. But if the cryptocurrency market goes down 50% people will sell their house to buy bitcoin or some crypto which they think is very profitable in the future.and the cryptocurrency market differs from the stock market in that it is much less regulated, whereas there are no rules or regulations governing how it works, which means that anyone can buy and sell cryptocurrencies as they please.it also means that the cryptocurrency market is much more volatile than the stock market because prices can go up and down very quickly, and this is the beauty that investors especially whales can take advantage of.

Stock up your BTCs and HODL for long-term for maximum profit and gains.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: if you look at almost the entire stock market and crypto is clearly different, you will not see in the stock market from what you see in the crypto market and vice versa, crypto can go up thousands of percent overnight and you will not likely see that in the stock market Likewise sometimes the crypto market can drop thousands of percent overnight and you don't find it in the stock market either, if you want to get rich quick and get poor quick you can play in the crypto market but for safe investment you can go to the stock market, both are completely different each has its advantages and disadvantages

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: In a way any market that you can trade in are the same. You can only make profit if you can speculate in that market by knowing what affects it and will lose money if you enter it blindly.But the difference that bitcoin has from other markets is that it is on an adoption path which means its price will always go up in the long run. Unlike stocks which don't really have an "adoption phase" and can only go up if the company is doing well or the economy is good.Quote from: fennic on October 04, 2022, 04:11:13 PMI have seen that Bitcoin is always goes in bull and also bear market seasons and in these cycles only big whales are earning and they wil be always be millionaires.You don't need to be a whale to make profit, you just have to be wise.QuoteBut in Stock market that has lasted almost decades to centuries and I do not know if they have also been going like Cryptocurrency market. The cryptocurrency (aka altcoins) market can be compared to penny stocks market which is a small market that lists shit stocks with low value and most of them have no utilities and die sooner or later. Altcoins are the same. We also have the market manipulation that is dominating the altcoin market because it is not regulated.QuoteI think that united States dollars was in bearish for many years when Us Has war with Afghanistan.All fiat currencies are always in a bear market simply because there is an unlimited supply of them. In other words the governments keep printing them so they lost their value over time.QuoteAnd now I think it is in bull run season for many years though United States economy is not too strong. Considering the inflation in US and how price of everything is going up, US dollar could be considered in a "bear market".

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: I think there's no much difference between bear market in stock market and cryptocurrency market, it's either because bad economy or some unpredictable bad news.Bad economy will ruin any market: stock, cryptocurrency, gold, silver, real estate etc will get affected too.Unpredictable bad news in stock market are like bankrupt, lawsuit, internal problem, etc which mostly you wouldn't know if you're not a big person in that's company. While in cryptocurrency market, it's much vary like country and bank ban crypto, government trying to attack crypto on anything etc.

comments.author: pawanjain
comments.body: In most cases, the bear markets in cryptocurrency have lasted around 2-3 years whereas in stock markets it has lasted longer.Cryptocurrency is still in its early stage and hence the volatility is high in crypto market and in the long term the price of bitcoin have always broken its ATH.The price of various cryptocurrencies are going up in the long run. In a nutshell while the stock market and crypto market do have some similarities, crypto market is fast moving with high volatility.

comments.body: Stock and Cryptocurrency market are completely different, also the holders are have different perception and different generation. I'd stock market is full of old or matured people while cryptocurrency market is full of millennial or younger generation. Younger generation will panic when there's a bad news and they're mostly doesn't know anything before invest. While old or matured people are more be careful and wouldn't be panic when there's a bad news.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: If you ask about psychology of market, it is the same in stock market and cryptocurrency market. Because human in general are very similar and they repeat their mistakes, their bad decisions from stock market to cryptocurrency market as well as other markets. They are greed when they should be fearful and they are fearful when they should be greed.However, market cycles can be different in stock market and in cryptocurrency market. It can be longer or shorter and the level of depression, angry, greed and so on in two markets can be different. In general, psychology cycle is similar and both markets must complete some basic phases in bear market as preparation for next bull market.Psychology of market cycles: https://fifthperson.com/psychology-market-cycles/
